name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior JavaScript Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in full-stack development, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Vue.js**, **Node.js**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3**. Proficient in leveraging modern ECMAScript standards (5/6), along with advanced CSS methodologies like **SASS** and **LESS** to create responsive, high-performance web applications. Strong background in adopting Agile methodologies, including Behavior-Driven Development, to enhance product quality and team collaboration.

Demonstrated success in developing scalable applications across healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring compliance with regulations like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Proven ability to lead projects that integrate complex features and improve user experience, showcasing skills in tools like **Gulp**, **Webpack**, and **Git** for efficient development workflows. I bring hands-on experience in enhancing products through automated testing using **Playwright**, along with a deep understanding of cloud strategies across **Azure** and **AWS**.
